actions: Warms the Womb and warms and unblocks the Chong and Ren channels.
Stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes Jing and Body Fluids, tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin, strengthens Kidney Yang, stabilizes the menses and stops bleeding.
With Dang Gui and Shu Di Huang, for night sweats due to Yin Deficiency.
With Shu Di Huang and Shan Yao, tonifies the Kidneys for urinary frequency (day or night), dizziness, tinnitus and lower back pain due to Kidney Deficiency.
With Shu Di Huang, Shan Yao, Zhi Fu Zi and Lu Rong, for Kidney Yang Deficiency.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine and benefits the marrow.
Nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin, nourishes Jing and Blood and fills the Marrow.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Deficiency marked by dizziness, palpitations, insomnia and menstrual dysfunction.
With Shan Zhu Yu, nourishes Kidney Yin and secures Jing, while restraining urination and sweating.
With Shan Zhu Yu and Shan Yao, for dizziness, weak and sore back, impotence, spermatorrhea and night sweats, due to Kidney and Liver Yin Deficiency.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
With Shan Zhu Yu and Tu Si Zi, for leukorrhea due to Spleen and Kidney Deficiency.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold and regulates the menses.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
Warms Ming Men Fire and assists Heart, Kidney and Spleen Yang.
With Fu Ling, for lower body edema and dysuria.
Transforms turbid Dampness, harmonizes the Middle Jiao, awakens the Spleen and promotes the movement of Qi.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang, regulates the Chong and Ren channels and stabilizes the Dai Channel.
With Shu Di Huang, for infertility and thin vaginal discharge due to Kidney Deficiency Cold.
Tonifies Kidney Yang
Generates Blood
Nourishes the Chong and Ren channels
Nourishes the uterus

symptoms: Long term infertility or infertility in an older woman
Possibly a history of late menarche
Delayed menstruation with decreased and pale menses or
Scanty, dark discharge at the end of menstruation
Aches and weakness in the waist and legs
Long-drawn-out urination with a thin stream or dribbling
Pain and coldness in loin and knees
Cold sensation in the lower abdomen
manifestations.pulse: Deep and weak or Thin and soft or Deep and thready or Deep, thready and forceless or Deep and slow
